data.title: Ryan Mortuary - Salina, KS
data.meta_description: Obituary for Charles  W. Mann |   KANSAS CITY -  Charles W. Mann, 75, passed away on Sunday, January 10, 2021.  Charlie was born January 9, 1946, in Salina, KS, the son of Leroy J. and Lucille G. (Larson) Mann.  He is preceded...
data.meta_site_name: Charles Mann Obituary | January 10, 2021 | Ryan Mortuary - Salina, KS
data.text:
Coping with Grief

We would like to offer our sincere support to anyone coping with grief. Enter your email below for our complimentary daily grief messages. Messages run for up to one year and you can stop at any time. Your email will not be used for any other purpose.
